project_plan.name: Python-Based Quiz Game
project_plan.description: Design a Python-based quiz game that asks the user multiple-choice questions, keeps track of the user's score, and displays it at the end of the game. The questions and answers should be stored in a variable inside the code.

task.name: Design the quiz questions and answers
Implement scoring system to track user's score
Implement a method to display the final score
Write tests for each of the game components (questions, scoring, display)
Execute tests on all implemented features to ensure that they function correctly
